alert.note: Alert for Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 07 at 1:10PM MST until January 08 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest Texas. * WHEN...From 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ this evening to midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Monday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eddy County Plains; Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County
